id.description: The unique identifier of the endorsement.

idea_id.description: The unique identifier of the idea being endorsed.

created_at.description: The timestamp when the endorsement was created.

updated_at.description: The timestamp when the endorsement was last updated.

link.description: The link associated with the endorsement.

id.description: The unique identifier of the endorsing portal user.

name.description: The name of the endorsing portal user.

email.description: The email of the endorsing portal user.

created_at.description: The timestamp when the endorsing portal user was created.

id.description: The unique identifier of the endorsing idea user.

name.description: The name of the endorsing idea user.

email.description: The email of the endorsing idea user.

created_at.description: The timestamp when the endorsing idea user was created.

id.description: The unique identifier of the endorsing idea organization.

name.description: The name of the endorsing idea organization.

created_at.description: The timestamp when the endorsing idea organization was created.

url.description: The URL of the endorsing idea organization.

resource.description: The resource associated with the endorsing idea organization.

id.description: The unique identifier of the endorsing user.

name.description: The name of the endorsing user.

email.description: The email of the endorsing user.

created_at.description: The timestamp when the endorsing user was created.

updated_at.description: The timestamp when the endorsing user was last updated.
